title: Cedar Plank Salmon
ingredients: ['1 (15cm) cedar plank', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '3 tablespoons water', '4 (170g) salmon fillets, with skin', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
